EiS.MinorDhar: All living souls within Willpower yards suffer a Minor Corrupting Influence and a Minor Miscast; a single result applies to all those within the area affected.
EiS.MajorDhar: All living souls within Willpower yards suffer a Major Corrupting Influence and a Major Miscast; a single result applies to all those within the area affected.
EiS.DoubleRolled: Counts as a minor corrupting influence
